parts.name: statement
parts.prose: Employ environmental control monitoring that provides an alarm or notification of changes potentially harmful to personnel or equipment to {{ pe-14.2_prm_1 }}.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: The alarm or notification may be an audible alarm or a visual message in real time to personnel or roles defined by the organization. Such alarms and notifications can help minimize harm to individuals and damage to organizational assets by facilitating a timely incident response.
